verbose_text: Calcineurin inhibitor cyclosporin A attenuated NS5 mediated inhibition of IFNbeta induced responses, for example, IFN sensitive response element driven luciferase, STAT1 dependent PKR mRNA expression, as well as phosphorylation and nuclear translocation of STAT1.
evidence: Calcineurin inhibitor cyclosporin A attenuated NS5-mediated inhibition of IFNbeta
